paymentMethods.title: Payment Methods
paymentMethods.description: Learn about our secure and available payment methods

creditCard.description: Pay securely with your credit or debit card. We accept all major credit cards with the highest security standards.

applePay.name: Apple Pay
applePay.description: Fast and secure payment with your Apple device. One-touch checkout with Face ID or Touch ID.

googlePay.name: Google Pay
googlePay.description: Simple and secure payment with your Google account. Quick checkout with just a few taps.

bankTransfer.name: Bank Transfer
bankTransfer.description: Direct transfer from your bank account. Secure and reliable payment method for larger orders.

paypal.name: PayPal
paypal.description: Pay with your PayPal account or link your credit card. Buyer protection included with every purchase.

ssl.title: SSL Encryption
ssl.description: All transactions are encrypted with 256-bit SSL technology to protect your sensitive information.

pci.title: PCI Compliant
pci.description: We follow strict PCI DSS standards to ensure your payment data is stored and processed securely.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Additional layer of security with 2FA for all payment transactions to prevent unauthorized access.

global.title: Global Payment Security
global.description: We partner with leading payment processors worldwide to ensure secure transactions everywhere.

paymentFaq.title: Payment Questions?
paymentFaq.description: Find answers to common questions about our payment process and security measures.

isSecure.question: Is it safe to pay on your site?
isSecure.answer: Yes, absolutely! We use industry-standard SSL encryption and PCI DSS compliance to protect all payment information. Your data is never stored on our servers.

availableMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
availableMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and bank transfers for your convenience.

whenCharged.question: When will I be charged?
whenCharged.answer: Your payment method will be charged immediately after you place your order. You'll receive a confirmation email with payment details.

canCancel.question: Can I cancel my payment?
canCancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your order within 24 hours of purchase. After this period, please contact our customer service team for assistance.

shipping.title: Shipping & Delivery
shipping.description: Comprehensive information about shipping options and delivery

express.name: Express Shipping
express.description: Get your order delivered quickly with our express shipping service. Perfect for urgent orders within major cities.

standard.name: Standard Shipping
standard.description: Reliable and affordable shipping option for all your regular orders. Free shipping on orders over $50.

international.name: International Shipping
international.description: We ship worldwide with trusted carriers. Customs fees may apply depending on your country.

local.areas: Menoufia، Tanta، Shebin El Kom، Ashmoun، Menouf، Quesna

main.areas: Cairo، Alexandria، Giza، Mansoura، Zagazig، Ismailia، Suez

remote.areas: Upper Egypt، Red Sea، South Sinai، New Valley، Matrouh

tracking.title: Real-Time Tracking
tracking.description: Track your shipment in real-time with our advanced tracking system

packaging.title: Secure Packaging
packaging.description: All orders are carefully packaged to ensure safe delivery

guarantee.title: Delivery Guarantee
guarantee.description: If your order doesn't arrive on time, we'll refund your shipping costs

premium.title: Premium Service
premium.description: Enjoy white-glove service with signature delivery and special handling

questionsAbout.title: Questions About Shipping?
questionsAbout.description: Our customer service team is here to help you with any shipping inquiries. Contact us anytime!

stillNeedHelp.title: Still Need Help?
stillNeedHelp.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help you

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your information

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: Your privacy is our priority and we never sell your personal data

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We're transparent about what data we collect and how we use it

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, information we collect automatically when you use our services, and information from third parties.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. Contact us if you wish to exercise these rights.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us using the information provided on our Contact page.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: Terms of service and conditions of use

legalAgreement.title: Legal Agreement
legalAgreement.description: These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and us

userProtection.title: User Protection
userProtection.description: We're committed to providing a safe and secure platform for all users

clearGuidelines.title: Clear Guidelines
clearGuidelines.description: Our terms provide clear guidelines on acceptable use of our services

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

services.title: Use of Services
services.content: You may use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms of Service.

account.title: User Accounts
account.content: When you create an account, you are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and all activities that occur under your account.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibited.content: You may not use our services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose or to violate any applicable laws in your jurisdiction.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The content, organization, graphics, design, compilation, and other matters related to this site are protected under applicable copyrights and other proprietary laws.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall our company be liable for any direct, indirect, punitive, incidental, special, or consequential damages.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the website.

general.question: How do I create an account?
general.answer: You can create an account by clicking the 'Register' button in the top navigation and filling out the required information.

general.question: How do I reset my password?
general.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions sent to your email address.

general.question: Can I change my email address?
general.answer: Yes, you can update your email address in your account settings under the Profile tab.

orders.question: How can I track my order?
orders.answer: You can track your order by logging into your account and visiting the 'My Orders' section, or using the tracking number sent to your email.

orders.question: What are your shipping options?
orders.answer: We offer standard shipping (3-5 business days) and express shipping (1-2 business days). Shipping costs are calculated at checkout.

orders.question: Can I change my shipping address?
orders.answer: You can change your shipping address before your order is processed. Contact our support team immediately if you need to make changes.

payments.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payments.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and other secure payment methods.

payments.question: Is my payment information secure?
payments.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard SSL encryption to protect your payment information during transmission.

payments.question: When will I be charged?
payments.answer: Your payment method will be charged immediately when you place your order.

returns.question: What is your return policy?
returns.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items in their original condition with tags and packaging.

returns.question: How do I initiate a return?
returns.answer: Contact our customer service team or visit the Returns section in your account to start the return process.

returns.question: How long does it take to process a refund?
returns.answer: Refunds are typically processed within 3-5 business days after we receive your returned item.

technical.question: The website is loading slowly. What should I do?
technical.answer: Try clearing your browser cache and cookies, or try accessing the site from a different browser or device.

technical.question: I'm having trouble placing an order. What should I do?
technical.answer: Make sure all required fields are filled correctly and your payment method is valid. If issues persist, contact our support team.

technical.question: How do I enable cookies?
technical.answer: Cookie settings can be found in your browser's privacy or security settings. Most browsers allow cookies by default.
